revision.text: ==Bambara== ===Conjunction=== {{head|bm|conjunction}} # [[before]] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|bm|sani}} ===References=== * Richard Nci Diarra, [http://bambara.org/fr/index.htm ''Lexique bambara-français-anglais''], December 13, 2010 ---- ==Swahili== ===Etymology=== Ultimately from {{der|sw|ar|يَعْنِي|t=[he/she/it] [[means]]}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|sw|Sw-ke-yaani.flac|Audio (Kenya)}} ===Interjection=== {{head|sw|interjection}} # {{lb|sw|adverbial, conjunctive, prepositional, or adjectival}} [[in other words]], [[actually]], [[namely]], [[to wit]], [[kind of]], [[somewhat]], [[id est]], [[that is]], [[meaning]], [[you know]] # {{lb|sw|filler}} [[er]], [[so]], [[uh]], [[well]]
